moves.1. e4 g6: The Modern Defense. I like it because you have your bishop in the flank, bearing down on a big diagonal.
moves.2. b3: Interesting, Trying to keep some control on the a1-h8 diagonal.
moves.2... Bg7 3. d4 c5: I like this move, It shows the first tactic, Attack the pinned piece!
moves.4. Bb2 Nc6 5. Nf3 cxd4 6. Bxd4: I would have taken with the knight, GK Computer calls it an inaccuracy.
moves.6... Nxd4 7. Nxd4 Nf6 8. e5: Tries to save the pawn but loses to a fork that I will show you next.
moves.11... Nxf2 12. Rf1: Rf1??? I'm not sure why he played this. All I was after with 11..... Nxf2 was that pawn but he gave me his queen.
moves.12... Nxd3+: And that's all she wrote as antonio37 resigns. Feel free to  make any comments!
